https://tmrev.io/movie/752889-Big Data, Big Brother 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/u8g8gfQ99xGHwF1WoY2v04dW0Da.jpg The story of the cross destiny of George Orwell (1903-50) and Aldous Huxley (1894-1963), the genius authors of the two most groundbreaking novels of anticipation of the 20th century: 1984 and Brave New World; two lucid witnesses of the maledictions of the modern world whose novels have found a considerable echo with our time. Big Data, Big Brother
